title: Building an AI Image Gallery: Advanced RAG With Pgvector and Claude Sonnet 3.5
author: Haziqa Sajid
description: In this article, we raise the RAG application challenge to build an AI-powered image gallery with OpenAI CLIP, Claude Sonnet 3.5, and pgvector.
cntitle: 构建 AI 图像库：使用 Pgvector 和 Claude Sonnet 3.5 的高级 RAG
cndescription: 本文探讨了使用 OpenAI CLIP、Claude Sonnet 3.5 和 pgvector 构建 AI 驱动的图片库的 RAG 应用挑战。
